page.title: 10Recreation in Bwlchysarnau
page.content: Different groups have been formed over the years to provide loac recreational facilities based on the church and the school. The oldest of these is the Womens Institute formed in 1951 and still meeting monthly at the school to educate and entertain its members.Over the years it has donated various things such as a water heater and a sign for the church. In recent years a youth group and a Mothers and Toddler's group have been started at the church by local volunteers, filling a need for somewhere to meet. This seems to be very important with the houses being so scattered. A library van visits Bwlchysarnau once a week from the County Library in Llandrindod Wells.
